Uses of Package
io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing

  • Packages that use io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing 
    Package Description
    io.honeycomb.beeline.spring.autoconfig

    io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing  
  • Classes in io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing used by io.honeycomb.beeline.spring.autoconfig 
    Class Description
    Beeline
    The Beeline class is the main/most-convenient point of interaction with traces in a Beeline-instrumented application.
    Span
    A Span represents an operation over its duration and associates the attributes contained within this class with it.
    SpanBuilderFactory
    Sampling
    SpanPostProcessor
    This applies post processing to Spans that are ready to be sent.
    Tracer
    The Tracer manages Spans using thread-local context.
  • Classes in io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing used by io.honeycomb.beeline.spring.beans

    The Tracer manages Spans using thread-local context.
  • Classes in io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing used by io.honeycomb.beeline.spring.utils 
    Class Description
    Span
    A Span represents an operation over its duration and associates the attributes contained within this class with it.
  • Classes in io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing used by io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing 
    Class Description
    Beeline
    The Beeline class is the main/most-convenient point of interaction with traces in a Beeline-instrumented application.
    Span
    A Span represents an operation over its duration and associates the attributes contained within this class with it.
    SpanBuilderFactory
    Sampling
    SpanBuilderFactory.SpanBuilder
    Builder to capture various attributes to initialise a Span with.
    SpanPostProcessor
    This applies post processing to Spans that are ready to be sent.
    Tracer
    The Tracer manages Spans using thread-local context.
    TracerSpan
    This class represents a Span that is managed by a Tracer.
